text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC Good for him.  Trying to protect his citizens from the disaster that's befallen states run by governors like Ron DeSantis where COVID-19 is spreading quickly due to ineptitude, lack of empathy & corruption.
